title: Win Opportunities: From Follow-up, Quotes to Orders
subtitle: Experience refined opportunity management, learn how to analyze competition, send professional quotes, and successfully convert prospects into sales orders.

steps.title: Visual Sales
steps.description: All opportunities are displayed centrally here. You can clearly see the stage of each opportunity and quickly edit key information anytime.

steps.title: Step 1: Opportunity Tracking & Management
steps.description: Successful sales starts with refined opportunity management. Let's dive into an opportunity to see how to track and maintain it.

steps.title: Dive into Opportunity Details
steps.description: Click the opportunity name to enter the dedicated details page. Here you'll find all information and tools related to this opportunity.

steps.title: Analyze Competition
steps.description: Know yourself and your competitors to win every battle. Record and analyze competitors' strengths and weaknesses here to develop more effective win strategies.

steps.title: Record Follow-up Progress
steps.description: Every communication with customers, every progress made, can be recorded here as follow-up comments, facilitating team collaboration and subsequent review.

steps.title: Step 2: Create Professional Quotes
steps.description: When an opportunity enters the quotation stage, a professional and accurate quote is key to winning customer trust.

steps.title: Initiate Quote Process
steps.description: On the opportunity details page, directly click to initiate quotation. The system will automatically associate customer information and start quote creation.

steps.title: Fill Quote Details
steps.description: Add specific product, quantity, price, and discount information to generate a comprehensive and professional quote.

steps.title: Step 3: Convert Opportunities to Orders
steps.description: After the quote is accepted by the customer, it's time for the final push - officially converting the opportunity into a sales order!

steps.title: Convert Opportunity to Order
steps.description: After quote approval, the "New Order" button on the opportunity details page will be activated. Click it to transfer all information to a new order, completing the crucial conversion.

steps.title: Confirm Final Order Information
steps.description: Finally confirm contract number, delivery details, and other order information to ensure everything is accurate.

steps.title: Success! Deal Won!
steps.description: Click submit, and this opportunity is officially closed and converted to sales revenue. Congratulations!

steps.title: View Results in Order Center
steps.description: After process completion, automatically jump to the order list. You can see the successfully created order, ready to start the delivery process.
